Comment: > I want to do one because I want [...]  Yeah, see, that's what a pollster (at least an honest one) absolutely doesn't want.  They don't want self-selected participants, as that will skew the data.  But likely the main reason you've never been selected for one is that the sampling sizes needed to get a decent statistical idea of the larger population are small enough that any one random person isn't overly likely to be approached.
